intro: This is the main content of the website.

about.mainTitle: From Family Tradition to an AI Leader in the Furniture Industry
about.intro: With over 40 years of family experience, PRIMEX bridges tradition and modern technology, leading the digital transformation in the furniture industry for the DACH region and beyond.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: PRIMEX is a company from Kosovo offering complete Backoffice services for the furniture and retail industry. For over a decade, we have been a trusted partner for major companies in Germany, Austria, and Switzerland, supporting both traditional stores and online platforms.

aiEvolution.title: From Manual Services to Artificial Intelligence
aiEvolution.description: The world of furniture is changing. Old systems and manual processes are slowing the industry down. PRIMEX turned this challenge into an opportunity, creating one of Europe's most advanced innovations.

aiAgent.title: AI Agent for Complaints – 70 Seconds
aiAgent.subtitle: Where a human spends 60–90 minutes, our AI completes the process in 70 seconds. This is the transformation redesigning the industry standard.

visionMission.title: Our Vision & Mission
visionMission.description: We see the future as a combination of human knowledge and artificial intelligence. Our mission is to help companies optimize processes, increase efficiency, and build a competitive advantage in the European market.
